details.overview: The Orthopedic Support PU Foam Mattress is ideal for anyone who is currently using a cotton or coir mattress and is looking to upgrade to something more comfortable without making a hole in their pockets. The top (comfort) layer of this mattress is made from Super Soft PU foam that helps cushion your joints and cradle your body while you sleep and the base (support) layer is made from our signature high resilience (HR) foam that works through the night to counter the force of gravity that is pulling your body downwards, and in the process ensures that every part of your body is adequately supported.
